cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yousei

sentence.kanji: その国の政府は各国に支援を要請したのよ。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni no seifu ha kakoku ni shien wo yousei shita no yo
sentence.english: The government of that country requested support from all nations.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's プロyakyuu

sentence.kanji: 最近のプロ野球は面白くなってきたね。
sentence.romaji: saikin no puroyakyuu ha omoshiroku nate kita ne
sentence.english: Recently professional baseball is getting interesting.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kouka

sentence.kanji: 彼女は高価な宝石を持っているわ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha kouka na houseki wo mote iru wa
sentence.english: She has expensive jewelry.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's konnichi

sentence.kanji: 今日の日本の若者は欧米化している。
sentence.romaji: konnichi no nihon no wakamono ha oubeika shite iru
sentence.english: Young people in Japan today are westernized.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youkou

sentence.kanji: 募集要項をよくお読みください。
sentence.romaji: boshuu youkou wo yoku o yomi kudasai
sentence.english: Please read the application guidelines carefully.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's juyou

sentence.kanji: 需要が多過ぎて生産が追い付きません。
sentence.romaji: juyou ga oosugi te seisan ga oitsukimasen
sentence.english: There's a lot of demand and production can't keep up.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's gainen

sentence.kanji: インターネットは情報の概念を変えたよね。
sentence.romaji: inta-neto ha jouhou no gainen wo kaeta yo ne
sentence.english: The Internet changed the concept of information.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinen

sentence.kanji: 卒業の記念にみんなで旅行したよ。
sentence.romaji: sotsugyou no kinen ni minna de ryokou shita yo
sentence.english: We all went on a trip to celebrate our graduation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shinnen

sentence.kanji: 自分の信念に従いたいと思います。
sentence.romaji: jibun no shinnen ni shitagaitai to omoimasu
sentence.english: I think I want to follow my own faith.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukumeru

sentence.kanji: 私を含めて10人が参加しました。
sentence.romaji: watashi wo fukumete 10 nin ga sanka shimashita
sentence.english: Ten people participated, myself included.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukumu

sentence.kanji: その食品は有害物質を含んでいるぞ。
sentence.romaji: sono shokuhin ha yuugai bushitsu wo fukunde iru zo
sentence.english: The food contains a poisonous substance.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's junjo

sentence.kanji: 正しい順序で操作してください。
sentence.romaji: tadashii junjo de sousa shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please carry out the operations in the correct order.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuhitsuyou

sentence.kanji: 不必要なファイルは削除してください。
sentence.romaji: fuhitsuyou na fuairu ha sakujo shite kudasai
sentence.english: Please delete any unwanted files.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiyoujin

sentence.kanji: 西洋人は正座が苦手よ。
sentence.romaji: seiyoujin ha seiza ga nigate yo
sentence.english: Westerners are not good at sitting with their legs folded underneath them.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youbou

sentence.kanji: お客様の要望を聞かせてください。
sentence.romaji: okyakusama no youbou wo kikasete kudasai
sentence.english: What would you like to request?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fuyou

sentence.kanji: 不要になったパソコンを処分したんだ。
sentence.romaji: fuyou ni nata pasokon wo shobun shita n da
sentence.english: I disposed of the unneeded personal computer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yatou

sentence.kanji: 野党が与党を厳しく非難していましたね。
sentence.romaji: yatou ga yotou wo kibishiku hinan shite imashita ne
sentence.english: The opposition party was severely criticizing the ruling party.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yokin

sentence.kanji: 私はこの銀行に預金しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kono ginkou ni yokin shite imasu
sentence.english: I've deposited money in this bank.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's seiyou

sentence.kanji: 私は西洋の建築に興味があります。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha seiyou no kenchiku ni kyoumi ga arimasu
sentence.english: I am interested in Western architecture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's entotsu

sentence.kanji: 工場の煙突から煙が上がっている。
sentence.romaji: koujou no entotsu kara kemuri ga agate iru
sentence.english: Smoke is rising from the factory's smokestack.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kemuri

sentence.kanji: 煙突から煙がまっすぐ上っていたの。
sentence.romaji: entotsu kara kemuri ga masugu agate ita no
sentence.english: Smoke was rising straight up from the chimney.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kirau

sentence.kanji: 父はラッシュアワーを嫌っています。
sentence.romaji: chichi ha rashuawa- wo kirate imasu
sentence.english: My father dislikes rush hour.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iyagaru

sentence.kanji: 彼はタバコの煙を嫌がるの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha tabako no kemuri wo iyagaru no
sentence.english: He dislikes cigarette smoke.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kigen

sentence.kanji: 彼女は大変機嫌がいいね。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha taihen kigen ga ii ne
sentence.english: She is in a very good mood.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sukikirai

sentence.kanji: 食べ物の好き嫌いは特にありません。
sentence.romaji: tabemono no sukikirai ha tokuni arimasen
sentence.english: I have no particular likes or dislikes when it comes to food.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kenson

sentence.kanji: そんなに謙遜しなくてもいい。
sentence.romaji: sonna ni kenson shinakute mo ii
sentence.english: You do not need to be so modest.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kaneru

sentence.kanji: 彼女は秘書と事務の担当を兼ねています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hisho to jimu no tantou wo kanete imasu
sentence.english: She's in charge of both secreterial and clerical work.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kitsuen

sentence.kanji: ここでは喫煙できません。
sentence.romaji: koko de ha kitsuen dekimasen 。
sentence.english: Smoking is not permitted here.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yobou

sentence.kanji: 虫歯は予防できます。
sentence.romaji: mushiba ha yobou dekimasu
sentence.english: Tooth decay can be prevented.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oou

sentence.kanji: 雲が空を覆っているね。
sentence.romaji: kumo ga sora wo oote iru ne
sentence.english: The sky is overcast.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's youshi

sentence.kanji: 会議の要旨は次の通りです。
sentence.romaji: kaigi no youshi ha tsugi no toori desu
sentence.english: The summary of the conference is as follows.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koshikakeru

sentence.kanji: 私はベンチに腰掛けたの。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha benchi ni koshikaketa no
sentence.english: I had a seat on the bench.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koshikake

sentence.kanji: 腰掛けはありませんか。
sentence.romaji: koshikake ha arimasen ka
sentence.english: Isn't there a seat?

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's imasara

sentence.kanji: 今更後悔しても、もう遅いよ。
sentence.romaji: imasara koukai shite mo mou osoi yo
sentence.english: It is too late for regrets.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chitsujo

sentence.kanji: その国の社会秩序は乱れているわ。
sentence.romaji: sono kuni no shakai chitsujo ha midarete iru wa
sentence.english: Social order in that country is in a state of chaos.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's okage

sentence.kanji: 先生のお陰で大学に合格できました。
sentence.romaji: sensei no okage de daigaku ni goukaku dekimashita
sentence.english: Thanks to the teacher, I was able to pass the college entrance exam.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kage

sentence.kanji: 陰で少し休憩しましょう。
sentence.romaji: kage de sukoshi kyuukei shimashou
sentence.english: Let's take a break in the shade.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's monokage

sentence.kanji: 私たちは物陰に隠れたんだ。
sentence.romaji: watashitachi ha monokage ni kakureta n da
sentence.english: We hid ourselves away.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fukigen

sentence.kanji: この頃、あの人は不機嫌ですね。
sentence.romaji: konogoro ano hito ha fukigen desu ne
sentence.english: He's been in a bad mood lately.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yobi

sentence.kanji: 旅行には予備の靴を持って行きます。
sentence.romaji: ryokou ni ha yobi no kutsu wo mote ikimasu
sentence.english: I'll take some spare shoes on holiday.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hiraku

sentence.kanji: 32ページを開いてください。
sentence.romaji: sanjuunipe-ji wo hiraite kudasai
sentence.english: Please open to page 32.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimeru

sentence.kanji: ちゃんとドアを閉めてよ。
sentence.romaji: chanto doa wo shimeteyo
sentence.english: Close the door properly.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikan

sentence.kanji: 今は時間がありません。
sentence.romaji: ima ha jikan ga arimasen
sentence.english: I don't have time now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shimaru

sentence.kanji: お店はもう閉まっていました。
sentence.romaji: omise ha mou shimate imashita
sentence.english: The shop had already closed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kimeru

sentence.kanji: 帰国することに決めました。
sentence.romaji: kikoku suru koto ni kimemashita
sentence.english: I've decided to go back to my country.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shitsumon

sentence.kanji: 質問のある方はどうぞ。
sentence.romaji: shitsumon no aru kata ha douzo
sentence.english: Please feel free to ask any questions.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's akeru

sentence.kanji: 窓を開けてください。
sentence.romaji: mado wo akete kudasai
sentence.english: Please open the window.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kiku

sentence.kanji: 彼女はラジオを聞いています。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha rajio wo kiite imasu
sentence.english: She's listening to the radio.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's chigau

sentence.kanji: 答えが違います。
sentence.romaji: kotae ga chigaimasu
sentence.english: That's the wrong answer.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tojiru

sentence.kanji: 教科書を閉じてください。
sentence.romaji: kyoukasho wo tojite kudasai
sentence.english: Please close your textbooks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kimaru

sentence.kanji: 旅行の日程が決まりました。
sentence.romaji: ryokou no nitei ga kimarimashita
sentence.english: I've decided on my travel schedule.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanashii

sentence.kanji: その映画はとても悲しかった。
sentence.romaji: sono eiga ha totemo kanashikata
sentence.english: That movie was very sad.
